医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究发现免疫系统活动可能是新冠病毒长期存在的原因新的研究表明，由人体自身免疫防御引起的血液蛋白质变化可能是导致新冠病毒长期感染的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/New-research-identizes-immune-system-activity-as-likely-cause-of-long-Covid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/New-research-identizes-immune-system-activity-as-likely-cause-of-long-Covid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e09637c2-e7cc-4ae6-acf6-7fb19774a5e1 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 15:03:00 -0500
研究人员开发了一种更值得信赖的方法来使用人工智能工具诊断疾病滑铁卢大学的一个跨学科研究团队开发了一种更值得信赖的方法，利用人工智能 (AI) 工具诊断 COVID-19、肺炎和黑色素瘤等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Researchers-develop-a-more-trustworthy-method-to-diagnose-diseases-using-AI-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Researchers-develop-a-more-trustworthy-method-to-diagnose-diseases-using-AI-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9274a58b-633a-4545-9572-c4793336daa4 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 14:56:00 -0500 Researchers develop a more trustworthy method to diagnose diseases using AI tools
质谱和组学如何影响神经科学？在这一集《omg OMx》中，Kate Stumpo 与 Sapient 的 Tanya Nguyen 谈论了组学和质谱在神经科学中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/How-do-mass-spectrometry-and-omics-impact-neurosciences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/How-do-mass-spectrometry-and-omics-impact-neurosciences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=144b5e3c-a5c9-4f55-9ed7-f085761b1edd Tue, 30 Jan 2024 11:43:00 -0500 How do mass spectrometry and omics impact neurosciences?
印度青少年的社交媒体使用和抑郁症状研究人员调查了印度青少年社交媒体使用与抑郁症状之间潜在的双向关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Social-media-usage-and-depressive-symptoms-among-adolescents-in-India.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Social-media-usage-and-depressive-symptoms-among-adolescents-in-India.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd4dd83a-0d03-4013-a13e-537e70582093 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 09:04:00 -0500 Social media usage and depressive symptoms among adolescents in India
研究显示地中海饮食可以降低焦虑和压力水平，但对抑郁症没有影响研究人员探讨了独立生活在澳大利亚的 60 岁以上成年人坚持地中海饮食与抑郁、焦虑和压力症状严重程度之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-anxiety-and-stress-levels-but-no-effect-on-depression-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-anxiety-and-stress-levels-but-no-effect-on-depression-study-shows.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55d3c569-6d78-4657-ac1d-f3faf16ffa55 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 08:41:00 -0500 Mediterranean diet linked to lower anxiety and stress levels, but no effect on depression, study shows
新药通过引发致命的钙风暴杀死肿瘤细胞钙离子对细胞至关重要，但浓度较高时可能有毒。一组研究人员现已设计并制备了一种组合药物，通过调节钙流入细胞来杀死肿瘤细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/New-drug-kills-tumor-cells-by-triggering-a-deadly-calcium-storm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/New-drug-kills-tumor-cells-by-triggering-a-deadly-calcium-storm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dab679e9-9a6a-4cf1-a280-089173040ab7 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 08:31:55 -0500 New drug kills tumor cells by triggering a deadly calcium storm
新研究强调了根据诊断标准的慢性阻塞性肺病患病率的区域差异慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）的全球和区域患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/New-research-highlights-regional-variations-in-COPD-prevalence-according-to-diagnostic-criteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/New-research-highlights-regional-variations-in-COPD-prevalence-according-to-diagnostic-criteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=529813c8-9737-4351-a21f-c9a93bb8a91d Tue, 30 Jan 2024 07:07:00 -0500 New research highlights regional variations in COPD prevalence according to diagnostic criteria
研究表明金色浆果对糖尿病和肥胖大鼠具有显着的健康益处富含金浆果（酸浆）的饮食对胰岛素抵抗和肥胖的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Study-reveals-significant-health-benefits-of-golden-berry-in-diabetic-and-obese-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Study-reveals-significant-health-benefits-of-golden-berry-in-diabetic-and-obese-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b70f3dd8-b399-4ab4-b03e-8b1e1d4a6d12 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 06:49:00 -0500 Study reveals significant health benefits of golden berries in diabetic and obese rats
新综述旨在帮助临床医生诊断和管理多囊卵巢综合征CMAJ 最近发表的一篇评论文章探讨了这种慢性疾病的诊断和治疗的当前知识状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/New-review-aims-to-help-clinicians-diagnose-and-manage-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/New-review-aims-to-help-clinicians-diagnose-and-manage-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b6a4fee-e8cf-4f48-bd7e-ae480d998dea Tue, 30 Jan 2024 06:30:00 -0500 New review aims to help clinicians diagnose and manage PCOS
网络反欺凌干预措施对中小学生有效吗？学校中基于网络的多成分干预措施对于防止欺凌和改善学校社会环境的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Are-web-enabled-anti-bullying-interventions- effective-among-primary-and-secondary-school-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Are-web-enabled-anti-bullying-interventions- effective-among-primary-and-secondary-school-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd07ea4b-489e-47f1-bc6f-53a97ff9f05c Tue, 30 Jan 2024 06:00:00 -0500 Are web-enabled anti-bullying interventions effective among primary and secondary school students?
